review_data.title: Not onest
review_data.content: The dinner was ok nothing fantastic. The day after I realised that they add randomly water and other items we didn’t order. I don’t like these games they use to do. For me one star

review_data.title: Decent restaurant layout with a tumour and a non-smoker booth
review_data.content: The steak we ordered medium-rare was delivered almost well-done. It was dry. This isn't acceptable at the price point that they sell their steaks for (c. CHF 100 per person excl appetisers and drinks).

review_data.title: Tough oily steak - never again
review_data.content: I ordered the fifty day dry aged Porterhouse medium rare, it should have been a buttery smooth treat. What came out was over cooked, tough, untrimmed and fatty, and oily. The oil didn't taste like butter, or seasoned in any way. Stunningly expensive for what...More
